aboutProject: The Skills First Research Tool chatbot has rich information about skills development, education policy, and employment training. It can provide you with case studies, research papers, policy documents, and resources. It can also provide you with recommendations on the basis of your preferences. It can also provide you with documents and URLs for further reading.

Skills Development.title: Digital Skills Training Programs
Skills Development.description: International programs focused on developing digital literacy and technical skills for the modern workforce.

Skills Development.title: Vocational Training Initiatives
Skills Development.description: A comprehensive overview of vocational training programs and their impact on employment outcomes.

Education Policy.title: Skills-First Education Reform
Education Policy.description: OECD's approach to reforming education systems to prioritize practical skills development.

Employment Training.title: Workforce Development Programs
Employment Training.description: Analysis of active labor market programs and their effectiveness in improving employment outcomes.

Skills First Research.title: Skills Gap Analysis
Skills First Research.description: Research on identifying and addressing skills gaps in the evolving job market.
